lyric.verse: Boku ga nan-sen MILE mo aruitara Te no hira kara daiji no mono ga koboreochita Omoide no uta guchizusamu Tsuganranai omoi wo tsuchi ni kaeshita Ima nan de aimai na henji wo kaeshita no Naze kimi wa itsu demo sonna ni kagayaiteru no Tsubasa ga haeta Konna ni mo nayamashii bokura mo Aruki tstzukeru Tsumaranai hibi wo chiisana karada ni Suritsukete mo heri hashinai Sukoshi sabishiku naru dake

lyric.verse: Tsuyoi mukai kaze huku Boku ga nan-sen MILE mo aruitara Dooshiyoo mo nai boku mo koto midomeru no kai Aishi aou dare yori mo Mizu tamari wa kiboo wo utsushite iru Yano yoo ni tsuki hi wa sugite Boku ga ikitaeta toki Watari tori no yoo ni nani kuwaru kaode Tobi tsutzukeru no kai
